data.name: Fall For You
data.detailed_description:
If you're reading this, then you probably just died and got thrown out of Heaven. Sorry about that. Good news, though; you get to be on a gameshow!


Conquer Hell With Love and Snuggles!
Fall For You is a rhythm-based roguelike. Dash and attack with the beat, win the hearts of every damned soul you meet, traverse perilous obstacle courses, win fabulous prizes that change the way you play, and cuddle with a scary demon mom to keep yourself going!

Dance Party!
Dash when the kick drum kicks, and attack when the snare drum snares!


Friends in Unexpected Places!
Shoot fellow damned souls with Cuddle Bullets to earn their admiration! Do battle with the Underworld's scariest foes!


The World Changes Around You!
Stay above the UnderFog, as the world rises and falls around you! Take on procedurally generated challenges to stay in the game and win prizes!


Fabulous Prizes!
Win prizes that change your look, and the way you play!


A Place to Rest Your Head
Cuddle with a scary demon mom to keep your health bar up! Survive the crazed whims of a self-proclaimed Goddesz of Chaos! Be nice to the twins!

data.short_description: Fall For You is a rhythm-based roguelike. Move and attack with the beat to power up, win the hearts of every damned soul you meet, traverse perilous obstacle courses, win fabulous prizes that change the way you play, and cuddle with a scary demon mom to keep yourself going!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and up
  • Processor: Core i5-2520M @2.50GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 64 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.10
  • Processor: Core i5-2520M @2.50GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 64 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any distribution
  • Processor: Core i5-2520M @2.50GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 64 MB available space
